card.name: Abu Ja'far
card.text: When Abu Ja'far dies, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by it. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Aladdin
card.text: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Aladdin.

card.name: Aladdin's Lamp
card.text: {X}, {T}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead look at the top X cards of your library, put all but one of them on the bottom of your library in a random order, then draw a card. X can't be 0.

card.name: Aladdin's Ring
card.text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Ali Baba
card.text: {R}: Tap target Wall.

card.name: Ali from Cairo
card.text: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Army of Allah
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Army of Allah
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Bazaar of Baghdad
card.text: {T}: Draw two cards, then discard three cards.

card.name: Bottle of Suleiman
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Brass Man
card.text: Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.

card.name: Camel
card.text: Banding As long as Camel is attacking, prevent all damage Deserts would deal to Camel and to creatures banded with Camel.

card.name: City in a Bottle
card.text: Whenever a nontoken permanent originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion other than City in a Bottle is on the battlefield, its controller sacrifices it. Players can't play cards originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion.

card.name: City of Brass
card.text: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Cuombajj Witches
card.text: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

card.name: Cyclone
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wind counter on Cyclone, then sacrifice Cyclone unless you pay {G} for each wind counter on it. If you pay, Cyclone deals damage equal to the number of wind counters on it to each creature and each player.

card.name: Dandan
card.text: Dandan can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Dandan.

card.name: Desert
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the end of combat step.

card.name: Desert Nomads
card.text: Desertwalk Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Desert Nomads by Deserts.

card.name: Desert Twister
card.text: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Diamond Valley
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

card.name: Drop of Honey
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy the creature with the least power. It can't be regenerated. If two or more creatures are tied for least power, you choose one of them. When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Drop of Honey.

card.name: Ebony Horse
card.text: {2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Elephant Graveyard
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Regenerate target Elephant.

card.name: El-Hajjaj
card.text: Whenever El-Hajjaj deals damage, you gain that much life.

card.name: Erg Raiders
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

card.name: Erg Raiders
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if Erg Raiders didn't attack this turn, Erg Raiders deals 2 damage to you unless it came under your control this turn.

card.name: Erhnam Djinn
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.

card.name: Eye for an Eye
card.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Eye for an Eye deals that much damage to that source's controller.

card.name: Fishliver Oil
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has islandwalk.

card.name: Fishliver Oil
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has islandwalk.

card.name: Flying Carpet
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Ghazban Ogre
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Ghazban Ogre.

card.name: Giant Tortoise
card.text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

card.name: Giant Tortoise
card.text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

card.name: Guardian Beast
card.text: As long as Guardian Beast is untapped, noncreature artifacts you control can't be enchanted, they have indestructible, and other players can't gain control of them. This effect doesn't remove Auras already attached to those artifacts.

card.name: Hasran Ogress
card.text: Whenever Hasran Ogress attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

card.name: Hasran Ogress
card.text: Whenever Hasran Ogress attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

card.name: Hurr Jackal
card.text: {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.

card.name: Ifh-Biff Efreet
card.text: Flying {G}: Ifh-Biff Efreet deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Island Fish Jasconius
card.text: Island Fish Jasconius doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, untap Island Fish Jasconius. Island Fish Jasconius can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Island Fish Jasconius.

card.name: Island of Wak-Wak
card.text: {T}: The power of target creature with flying becomes 0 until end of turn.

card.name: Jandor's Ring
card.text: {2}, {T}, Discard the last card you drew this turn: Draw a card.

card.name: Jandor's Saddlebags
card.text: {3}, {T}: Untap target creature.

card.name: Jeweled Bird
card.text: Remove Jeweled Bird from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {T}: Put Jeweled Bird into the ante. If you do, put all other cards you own from the ante into your graveyard, then draw a card.

card.name: Jihad
card.text: As Jihad enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent. White creatures get +2/+1 as long as the chosen player controls a nontoken permanent of the chosen color. When the chosen player controls no nontoken permanents of the chosen color, sacrifice Jihad.

card.name: Junun Efreet
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junun Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.

card.name: Juzam Djinn
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Juzam Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Khabal Ghoul
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, put a +1/+1 counter on Khabal Ghoul for each creature that died this turn.

card.name: King Suleiman
card.text: {T}: Destroy target Djinn or Efreet.

card.name: Kird Ape
card.text: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

card.name: Library of Alexandria
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

card.name: Magnetic Mountain
card.text: Blue creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped blue creatures he or she controls and pay {4} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Merchant Ship
card.text: Merchant Ship can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Whenever Merchant Ship attacks and isn't blocked, you gain 2 life. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Merchant Ship.

card.name: Metamorphosis
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Metamorphosis, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is one plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

card.name: Mijae Djinn
card.text: Whenever Mijae Djinn attacks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove Mijae Djinn from combat and tap it.

card.name: Nafs Asp
card.text: Whenever Nafs Asp deals damage to a player, that player loses 1 life at the beginning of his or her next draw step unless he or she pays {1} before that draw step.

card.name: Nafs Asp
card.text: Whenever Nafs Asp deals damage to a player, that player loses 1 life at the beginning of his or her next draw step unless he or she pays {1} before that draw step.

card.name: Oasis
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Old Man of the Sea
card.text: You may choose not to untap Old Man of the Sea during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to Old Man of the Sea's power for as long as Old Man of the Sea remains tapped and that creature's power remains less than or equal to Old Man of the Sea's power.

card.name: Oubliette
card.text: When Oubliette enters the battlefield, exile target creature and all Auras attached to it. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature. When Oubliette leaves the battlefield, return that exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it. If you do, return the other exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control attached to that permanent.

card.name: Oubliette
card.text: When Oubliette enters the battlefield, exile target creature and all Auras attached to it. Note the number and kind of counters that were on that creature. When Oubliette leaves the battlefield, return that exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control tapped with the noted number and kind of counters on it. If you do, return the other exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control attached to that permanent.

card.text: Blocking creatures get +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.text: Blocking creatures get +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.text: {2}: Choose one - Destroy target Aura attached to a land; or the next time target land would be destroyed this turn, remove all damage marked on it instead.

card.name: Ring of Ma'ruf
card.text: {5}, {T}, Exile Ring of Ma'ruf: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand.

card.name: Rukh Egg
card.text: When Rukh Egg dies, put a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.text: When Rukh Egg dies, put a 4/4 red Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sandals of Abdallah
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, destroy Sandals of Abdallah.

card.name: Sandstorm
card.text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

card.name: Serendib Djinn
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a land. If you sacrifice an Island this way, Serendib Djinn deals 3 damage to you. When you control no lands, sacrifice Serendib Djinn.

card.name: Serendib Efreet
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, Serendib Efreet deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Shahrazad
card.text: Players play a MAGIC subgame, using their libraries as their decks. Each player who doesn't win the subgame loses half his or her life, rounded up.

card.name: Sindbad
card.text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

card.name: Singing Tree
card.text: {T}: Target attacking creature's power becomes 0 until end of turn.

card.name: Sorceress Queen
card.text: {T}: Target creature other than Sorceress Queen becomes 0/2 until end of turn.

card.text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ydwen Efreet
card.text: Whenever Ydwen Efreet blocks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove Ydwen Efreet from combat and it can't block this turn. Creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only Ydwen Efreet this combat become unblocked.
